PayloadSegment - Class in model
A payload segment contains the restoration metadata and the payload.
PayloadSegment(File, File, AbstractAlgorithm) - Constructor for class model.PayloadSegment
A payload segment consists of: START_SEQ, restoration metadata, END_HEADER_SEQ, payload bytes, END_SEQ.

This constructor is for spare algorithms with low capacity.
